title:
Inverse problem for 3-rd order operators under the 3-point Dirichlet
  conditions
abstract:
We solve an inverse problem for a third order differential operator under the
3-point Dirichlet conditions. The third-order operator is an $L$-operator in
the Lax pair for the good Boussinesq equation. We construct the mapping from
the set of the coefficients to the set of spectral data. This mapping is an
analytic bijection on a neighborhood of the zero.
